/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with power lines and buildings, creating a typical urban landscape. Cars are parked along the sides of the street, adding to the city's hustle and bustle. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with white clouds, providing a beautiful backdrop to the cityscape. The sun shines brightly, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the buildings and cars. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and cars.
